profile.name: Ethan Carter
profile.title: Full-Stack Developer
profile.description: I specialize in creating dynamic web applications using modern technologies. My expertise includes front-end development with React, back-end development with Node.js, and database management with PostgreSQL. I am passionate about building scalable and user-friendly solutions.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: I'm currently seeking new opportunities and would love to hear from you. Whether you have a project in mind or just want to connect, feel free to reach out.

form.name: Name
form.messagePlaceholder: Tell me about your project, ideas, or just say hello! I'd love to hear from you.
form.nameHelp: Enter your full name as you'd like to be addressed
form.emailHelp: I'll use this to respond to your message
form.messageHelp: Share your thoughts, project details, or collaboration ideas

success.title: Message sent successfully!
success.description: I'll get back to you as soon as possible.

error.title: Unable to send message
error.network: Network error occurred. Please check your connection and try again.
error.validation: Please check your input and try again.
error.rateLimit: Too many submissions. Please wait a minute before trying again.
error.cooldown: Please wait a moment before submitting again.

validation.nameMinLength: Name must be at least 2 characters
validation.nameMaxLength: Name must be no more than 50 characters
validation.namePattern: Name can only contain letters, spaces, hyphens, apostrophes, and periods
validation.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
validation.emailMaxLength: Email must be no more than 100 characters
validation.messageMinLength: Message must be at least 10 characters
validation.messageMaxLength: Message must be no more than 1000 characters

form.keyboardShortcut: Press Ctrl + Enter to send quickly
